snippet: Federal health officials reported a new outbreak of swine flu on Friday, mostly among children who appeared to have picked up the virus at county fairs.
abstract: Federal health officials report that sixteen people have become infected in a new outbreak of swine flu; most infected are children who appear to have picked up the virus at county fairs.
lead_paragraph: Federal health officials reported a new outbreak of swine flu on Friday, mostly among children who appeared to have picked up the virus at county fairs.

headline.main: C.D.C. Reports Outbreak of Swine Flu
headline.print_headline: C.D.C. Reports Outbreak of Swine Flu
